alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 9:46PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, southeastern Sequoyah and northern Le Flore Counties through 1030 PM CST... At 946 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles south of Mccurtain, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and dime to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Poteau... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Panama... Keota... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Gans... Cameron... Mc Curtain... Shady Point... Rock Island... Cowlington... Scullyville... Braden... Cottonwood... Milton... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 315 and 323. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
